attributes.action: At 21:58 on the 19th of every January we pay respect to the memory of Megaupload
attributes.additional_details:
Megaupload was basically mecca for music lovers. Its memory must be respected. I propose we hold 2 minutes silence across the UK in its honour; iPods, iTunes, Spotify all turned off, speakers around the country with the power buttin flipped, a simultaneous, country-wide BING of the windows alert telling you you've just muted your laptop.

Let's do this properly guys.
Lorcan.
